billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Makes certain provisions regarding court ordered stay or suspension of commission orders
summary: Provides that notwithstanding the granting of a new tariff schedule, subject to refund with interest, the court may find great and irreparable damage on the basis of evidence submitted in seeking an order staying or suspending an order of the public service commission.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the staying or suspending of certain orders of the commission by the supreme court
